name: Deli's Duty
description:
@FranklinsGhost

Made for Stop Motion Jam 2020

Second year entering and wanted to continue making simple old games with play-doh. In this case it's a card matching game where you have to find the lost matching pairs to clear the board in the fastest time and beat your fastest score.

Used the great tool https://gophergames.itch.io/spasm to quickly resize the photos taken and remove background.
